title: UAE wealth fund plans $4-5 billion in investments via India's new finance hub: Sources
description: Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA), the largest sovereign wealth fund in the UAE, plans to set up a $4-5 billion fund in India through GIFT City in Gujarat. ADIA has received in-principle approval from the regulatory authority at GIFT City. ADIA will be the first sovereign wealth fund to invest in India via GIFT City.
